A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Kept many themes of Empire and Jedi\, and then branched out in new and unexpected ways. Lukes progression was great and expected based on the facts from Force Awakens. I believe many people expected simple a re-telling of Empire (Like Force Awakens mirrored New Hope) but they are no longer running straight copies of the previous films. Not a perfect film\, but I believe they did the franchise justice.
